verbs.description: [ARG0: Lousy Democratic Gov. Andrew Cuomo] [V: shares] [ARG1: quite a few donors with Donald Trump , from relatively obscure billionaires like Nelson Peltz and John Paulson to some big names on Team Trump : Anthony Scaramucci , who was briefly Trump 's communications] ...
